thread.title: Protests against civilian killings, rape of minor erupt in Indian Kashmir

title: Protests against civilian killings, rape of minor erupt in Indian Kashmir
text:
Protests against civilian killings, rape of minor erupt in Indian Kashmir 8:39am EDT - 00:45 
Violent protests erupt in Indian Kashmir over the killing of civilians and the rape of an eight-year-old girl in the strife-torn state. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Violent protests erupt in Indian Kashmir over the killing of civilians and the rape of an eight-year-old girl in the strife-torn state. Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2qrVBsN
